sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; export default function MobilCard({ mobil }) { const carImage = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fnurhidayat/probable-garbanzo/main/public/' + mobil.image.substring(1); return (
{mobil.manufacture} {mobil.model} / {mobil.type}
Rp {mobil.rentPerDay} / hari

{mobil.description}

{mobil.capacity} Orang
{mobil.transmission}
Tahun {mobil.year}
); }
